scripts.start: yarn run stop && concurrently "yarn run frontend" && "yarn run backend"
scripts.psql-docker-redo-db: sudo systemctl stop postgresql && cd database && ./docker_redo-db.sh && cd .. && docker-compose build db && docker-compose up db
scripts.psql-docker-redo-db-nocache: sudo systemctl stop postgresql && cd database && ./docker_redo-db.sh && cd .. && docker-compose build --no-cache db && docker-compose up --force-recreate db
